name: The Machine - KIT109 Exam Game
description:
Controls:

Z - Left Paddle

/ - Right Paddle

Space - Shoot and Boost

Left Mouse - Debug Ball Movement

References:

Digital Font: https://www.dafont.com/ds-digital.font

Mechanical Font: https://www.dafont.com/mechanical-animals.font

Thumbnail Art: https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/2079410-mecha-japan-ronin-artwork-illustrati...

Sound Effects: https://www.kenney.nl/assets?q=audio

Feature List:
  • Ball shooting
  • Paddle movement
  • Level completion / game over
  • Ball reset
  • Ball movement
  • Debug ball placement (Mouse Click)
  • Turbo Boost
  • Bounce Pads
  • Ball Trail
  • Audio on ball collision
  • Music
  • Title screen with level select
  • In-game UI
  • In-game Bonus UI
  • Start of level text
  • End of level text
  • 6 Levels
